CustomField.description: If true, and if the "classy_mode_enabled" option is true, this will check the "Classy Mode" selection by default on donation forms on Classy
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If true, and if the "classy_mode_enabled" option is true, this will check the "Classy Mode" selection by default on donation forms on Classy
CustomField.label: Classy Mode Checked By Default
